name: Rootless (erwinumali)
description:
Created in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2023.

Controls:

Left/Right - Move and Hit the Beat
Spacebar - Hit the Beat (when on the same lane)

Move to the beat! You play as a seed looking to grow into a great tree. Pick up nutrients as you soar higher into the sky. Rhythm-scroller to pick up nutrients on the beat. Missing the notes or the beat brings you down. 

See how tall your tree grew after the game!

Team Soupware:

neegool
arcticpandesal
demetristerling
nekoneebie

Credits:

Kevin Macleod - Dream Culture (BGM)
